Posts.Content: Having it via Da Vinci by Dr. Davis. Been told an overnight stay and discharge, and by others on the medical team upwards of three nights and discharge. Going up Sunday and overnight at the Rotary House. Sort of curious if anyone else out there has had the Da Vinci @ MD Anderson by Dr. Davis. Was told he is the best. Curious your length of stay Pain, Pain control etc Removal of Foley after 10 days. I live down in the Corpus Christi area and was told to remove the foley down in Corpus ? Anyway.....what was your experience? Any advice? Thanks Bill
Posts.Title: prostatectomy - MD Anderson on July 27th
